## firms.Api.observe() method

Creates a subscription for the firm associated with the current context.

Only one subscription will be made per session. Regardless of how many times this function is called, the last registered callback will be used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
observe(callback: (firm: Firm) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | (firm: [Firm](./smokeball-client-sdk.firms.firm.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | the function to execute when a change is made to firm(s) in Smokeball. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```
sdk.firms.observe(firm => {
  // Perform syncing code here.
});
```
